iframe.title: New York Times Video - Embed Player

p: In this assignment, you will have an engaging and personalized discussion experience with your peer students of the course world-wide. Using this NY Times article as food for thought, share your idea on the subject matters, and lead the group of your virtual colleagues into the meaningful consensus. Your credit will be given after writing 3 original posts and 3 replies about other students' posts. Yet, there's no upper limit and you can go much further.
